articles.summary: Morgan Stanley analyst has issued a warning that may impact risky assets, including stocks and cryptocurrencies such as Ethereum, Jasmy, Cardano, Kaspa, and PEPE. The ETH price has risen to $1,575, a slight increase from the year-to-date low.

articles.title: Analyst Says ‘Reliable' Macro Breakout Signal for Bitcoin Confirmed, Calls for BTC Bullish Trend Shift
articles.author: The Daily Hodl
articles.summary: Trader Kevin Svenson says Bitcoin is about to flip bullish as technical indicators flash green for BTC. Bitcoin's relative strength index (RSI) on the weekly chart confirms a bullish breakout after the last week's sell-off, Svenson tells his 161,100 followers.

articles.title: Saylor Goes Deep: $555M Bitcoin Buy Fuels Strategy Comeback
articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.summary: Strategy bought 6,556 Bitcoin worth $555.8 million between April 14 and April 20. The latest move takes the company's total Bitcoin to 538,200 BTC. The company now has over $36 million in the Bitcoin.   .

Bitcoin price has held steady above $88,000, while the valuation of all cryptocurrencies has jumped to $2.75 trillion. This article provides the forecast of top altcoins like Reserve Rights (RSR), IOTA (IOTA), Pendle.

articles.title: Is Bitcoin Following Gold's Power Curve? Analyst Predicts $450,000 Target By Q4 2025
articles.author: Bitcoinist
articles.summary: Gold is trading at $3,420 per ounce. Bitcoin (BTC) may soon follow the precious metal's price trajectory. BTC has tracked gold's 'power curve' since 2011. Bitcoin to mirror gold's price action is still on the table, according to Master of Crypto.

articles.title: Unveiling the Revolutionary INIT Tokenomics: A Deep Dive into Initia's Layer-1 Blockchain
articles.author: Bitcoin World
articles.summary: The Initia Foundation revealed the tokenomics for INIT token, the lifeblood of their innovative layer-1. The unveiling of a new project's tokenomics is always a moment of intense scrutiny and excitement for the cryptocurrencian world.

articles.title: Here's a beginners guide to NFT art
articles.author: Ananya Mehta
articles.summary: NFT stands for Non-Fungible Token. An NFT is a digital certificate of ownership. It proves that you own a unique digital item, like an artwork, a song, or a tweet. NFT art is simply artwork that has been turned into an NFT on a blockchain platform.
